title: Google\Cloud\ContactCenterInsights\V1\DeleteConversationRequest
name: DeleteConversationRequest
description:
The request to delete a conversation.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.contactcenterinsights.v1.DeleteConversationRequest

params.description: Required. The name of the conversation to delete.

params.name: data.force
params.description: If set to true, all of this conversation's analyses will also be deleted. Otherwise, the request will only succeed if the conversation has no analyses.
